name: Click and Prosper
description:
Click and Prosper

In this game you click your way through the catastrophes that plague your village. Manage your resources and population carefully, and you might just make it through!

How to Play

Click the buttons on the left to gather resources. Each click will gather 3 of the resource, but cost 1 of each of the previous resources per person in your village. Each person in your village will multiply how much your clicks are worth! The bigger the village, the easier to gather resources!

Every few days your seer will warn you about the misfortunes that the future holds for your village. Prepare accordingly, or your village may fall! 

Good luck!

Clicker Jam

This game was made for the Clicker Jam Spring 2022 by:

  • Pedro Godinho
  • Afonso Ormonde
  • José Siopa

We are members of GameDev Técnico
